SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_status_by_group_id, role_id, company_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, claim_status_by_role_id FROM elp_claim_status_by_user_role WHERE claim_status_by_role_id = :claim_status_by_role_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_status_by_user_role SET claim_status_by_group_id = :claim_status_by_group_id, role_id = :role_id, company_id = :company_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claim_status_by_role_id = :claim_status_by_role_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claim_status_by_user_role ( claim_status_by_group_id, role_id, company_id, created_by, claim_status_by_role_id ) VALUES ( :claim_status_by_group_id, :role_id, :company_id, :created_by, :claim_status_by_role_id )
